Squizzy::

She went back into the lab.  She looked at KitKat3.  "Well, Zardus is 
glad your in good condition. He'll have a mission for you soon I'm 
sure. 

::KitKat3::
She nodded. "Yes, I'm sure he will. But what of my troops? Are they 
still alive?"

Squizzy::
She wasn't sure how to answer the question. "Uh, well, from what 
little information I have gathered, they are no longer on the list of 
targets.  They may be all lost. I'm not sure. You can double check 
with Zardus when he gets back."

KitKat3::
She lowered her head. Then Drillbit and my pack must be dead then, 
she thought to herself.  She felt her spark sink at the thought.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Whoops, sorry, my fault. I missed it the first time around.
> 
> ::Zardus::
> 
> Zardus recieves the transmission from Mortem, turning to Squizzy. 
> "I'll be back in a bit. Get KitKat ready to go."
> 
> With that he turns, walking off toward the exit of the Iron Fist. 
He 
> exits, seeing the Onyx. He smiles to himself. A ship such as that 
> would be a great addition to the Alliance, if they were friendly.
> 
> "Welcome, Mortem," Zardus says, walking forward toward Mortem. "I'm 
> Zardus, Alliance commander."
> 
>
